column3: There is nothing in this flowerpot.
<hex:02280AFF05>Item<hex:E8020A03><hex:02100103>This crop is ready to be harvested.
Are you certain you wish to remove this crop?
The <hex:022F10FF0E02280AFF054974656DE8020A0303> have taken root, and the crop is doing well.
The <hex:022F10FF0E02280AFF054974656DE8020A0303> have taken root, but the crop has seen better days...

Perhaps it will yield <hex:020990E802FF0C>red flowers<hex:FF0D>blue flowers<hex:FF0F>yellow flowers<hex:FF0E>green flowers<hex:FF0F>orange flowers<hex:FF0F>purple flowers<hex:FF32>flowers, but who can say what color they might be<hex:03>...
Perhaps it will yield <hex:02092DE802FF04>red<hex:FF05>blue<hex:FF07>yellow<hex:FF06>green<hex:FF07>orange<hex:FF07>purple<hex:03> flowers, or perhaps flowers of a more unusual shade...
